Text.Value: I can introduce you all, if you want?

EditorData.NodeContext: Love and warmth in your voice as you brighten up at the mention of your nephews

Text.Value: How about... 'two tiefling queens, frightful and fierce.'

EditorData.NodeContext: Grinning as you get into the joking and flirting. Having fun.

Text.Value: Hey, don't talk like that. We'll work on it.

EditorData.NodeContext: Familiar and more gentle - you like teasing your friend but don't want to upset her

Text.Value: This is a bad idea.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Crossing your arms and looking away
EditorData.NodeContext: You're embarassed.

Text.Value: Live a little!

EditorData.NodeContext: Teasing and flirtatious

Text.Value: But that's not what happened...

EditorData.NodeContext: Laughing a little at your friend being ridiculous

Text.Value: You got friends or family in the city?
That's more like it! How many goblins did we kill? Ten?

EditorData.NodeContext: Big smile and gesture of approval. Encouraging her.

Text.Value: Aha! Only a child would find that intimidating.

EditorData.NodeContext: You burst out laughing at your friend's attempt at a 'glare' - she did a terrible job

Text.Value: If the owner has any sense, they'll hire you on the spot.

EditorData.NodeContext: Smiling and confident - you mean every word you say. You really admire Alfira.

Text.Value: Pfft, none of that poetic stuff! Something like...

EditorData.NodeContext: Teasing and laughing as you wave the suggestion away

Text.Value: What are you going to do in the city?

EditorData.NodeContext: Relaxed and friendly

Text.Value: Let's make it twenty.

EditorData.NodeContext: A cheeky grin as you lean in, having fun

Text.Value: Don't worry. I can get us both jobs as guards. If you practice.

EditorData.NodeContext: Said with a shrug, like it's no big deal. You actually care deeply for Alfira but are trying to play it cool.

Text.Value: Haha! That's my girl!

EditorData.NodeContext: Laughter, perhaps clap you hands in delight

Text.Value: All right, erm, 'hearts aquiver, we raised our bows...'

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Holding your lute in your hands - not playing it.
EditorData.NodeContext: Having fun but a little hesitant as you try to come up with something. Not sung, just repeated like a poem

Text.Value: All right. *ahem* What - what you looking at?

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Try to square your shoulders and look intimidating (spoiler, you don't)
EditorData.NodeContext: Nervous, after you 'cough' your 'what - what are you looking at' should sound comically agressive. You stumble on the words and maybe drop your voice lower, or something? An unconvincing performance either way.

Text.Value: I'd like that.

EditorData.NodeContext: Love and warmth in your voice

Text.Value: C'mon Alfie, make it spicy.

EditorData.NodeContext: Teasing and flirtatious. Your friend is composing a song about the tiefling's exploits.

Text.Value: None. You?
What's your plan for the city?
Lesson number one: intimidation. Go.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Sitting up, looking at Alfira and gesturing to your own face
EditorData.NodeContext: Playful and teasing

Text.Value: I don't know anymore.

EditorData.NodeContext: The player has convinced you to quit being a bard. You feel lost and directionless.

Text.Value: A sister. She's got two boys - the sweetest things you've ever seen.
Eh, there's always work for a guard. You?

EditorData.NodeContext: 'EH' comes with a shrug, you haven't really thought of it.

Text.Value: I've always wanted to sing at the Elfsong Tavern.

EditorData.NodeContext: A little hesitant - you're afraid somewhere as prestigous as the Elfsong Tavern would never take you

Text.Value: 'Goblins swarmed, but we were brave and fried them all with a Thunder Wave!'

EditorData.NodeContext: Big dramatic voice as you recite your 'poetry'

Synopsis: This is a warm and flirtatious back and forth between Alfira and Lakrissa. They learn about themselves, and quickly realise how much they enjoy the others company.
